column4: having install probs with edubuntu, freezes on 'starting up the partitioner'.  help?
old hp with 64mb ram, has windows me on it i want to get rid of
I have a dell inspiron 7500. 5+ years old. Bought some memory, new hard drive, dvd burner, and it is now cooking with ubuntu. :)
I started with 128M, double what you have. Managed to get crawling, and I mean crawling. I bumped it up to system limit of 512M ram, and this is usable.
